just learning about these turkey reds, im fascinated by how gorgeous they are.
Quick question
the ones with pinholes almost automatically knock the grade to a 1 no matter how nice the rest of the card is
is that a fair assumption?
Sounds about right to me. This one has no pinholes. Are you interested in buying?

[quote name="BigDan502" post=903598]just learning about these turkey reds, im fascinated by how gorgeous they are.
Quick question
the ones with pinholes almost automatically knock the grade to a 1 no matter how nice the rest of the card is
is that a fair assumption?[/QUOTE]


You are absolutely correct.  Any pinhole, no matter how small, knocks the card down to an automatic 1.  I have some absolutely beautiful T3's that without the pinholes, would be easy 4's, but due to tiny pinholes in the gray border, they're graded a 1.

Steve
So either of ya wanna buy it? ;)
